questions.question: This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
This arc is set in a marine base and features Luffy's attempt to infiltrate the base to retrieve a crew member. What is...?
This ability allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to transform into a dragon or a dragon-like creature. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

questions.question: This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Kid Pirates, is known for his metal manipulation powers and rivalry with Luffy. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for their former bounty of 340 million berries and their power of the Mera Mera no Mi. Who is...?
